import illustrationImg from '../images/illustration.svg' import logoImg from '../images/logo.svg' import googleIconImg from '../images/google-icon.svg' import '.././styles/auth.scss' import { Button } from '../components/Button' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { AuthContext } from '../App' import { useContext} from 'react' export function Home(){ const history = useHistory(); const {user , singInWithGoogle } = useContext(AuthContext) async function handleCreateRoom(){ if(!user){ await singInWithGoogle() } history.push('/rooms/new'); } return(
Crie salas de Q&A ao-vivo

Tire as dúvidas da sua audiẽncia em tempo- real

{user?.name}

ou entre em uma sala
) }
